column2: "Sɛ ekɔ Nyankopɔn fie a
column3: hwɛ dza eyɛ no yie. Oye dɛ ebɛbɛn etsie
column4: sen dɛ ebɔbɔ afɔr dɛ nkwasea: na hɔn dze

column2: "Mma mma w'ano nnyɛ tobɛrtobɛr
column3: na mma mma w'akoma mmpɛ ntsɛm nnkasa wɔ Nyankopɔn enyim; na Nyankopɔn wɔ sor
column4: na ɔwo dze ewɔ ase: dɛm ntsi ma wo kasaa nyɛ nyaa na ntsiantsia."

column2: "Na adaaso dze edwuma dodow ba; na ɔkwasea ne ndze dze nsɛm dodow ba."
"Sɛ ebɔ Nyankopɔn anohoba a
column3: mma nnkyinkyim no tua ho: tua dza edze bɔɔ anohoba no."

column2: "Ɔfanyim dɛ ennkɔbɔ anohoba
column3: sen dɛ ebɔbɔ anohoba na innkotua."

column2: "Mma mma kwan ma w'ano mmfa wo nnkɔ bɔn mu; eso mma nnse ɔbɔfo no dɛ dza mekae no mfom a. Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na ebɛma Nyankopɔn no bo efuw wo ndze
"Na dɛm na ɔnam adaaso dodow na egyangyandze na nsɛm pii do ba: Nyankopɔn mbom na ɔwo dze suro no."
"Sɛ ihu ɔbɔbɔfo ne haw
column3: na atsɛmbu na pɛrpɛr a ɔadan enyi enyiber mu wɔ ɔmansin biara mu a
column4: mma mma dɛm adze no nnyɛ wo nwanwa: na obi a ɔyɛ abɔso no
column5: rohwɛ no so no do; na abɔso bi wɔ hɔ sen hɔn nyina."

column2: "Nkyii so asaase do mfaso wɔ hɔ ma nyimpa nyinara: na asaase som ɔhen nankasa."
"Nyia ɔpɛ dwɛɛtɛɛ no
column3: dwɛɛtɛɛ nnkɛmee no; na nyia ɔpɛ adze dodow no
column4: ndɔbaa nnkɛmee no: iyi so egyangyandze a."

column2: "Aber a ndzepa adɔɔ so no
column3: hɔn a wodzi no so dɔɔ so: na mfaso bɛn na ɔwɔ hɔ ma ndzɛmba no wura

column2: "Odwumayɛfo ne nda yɛ dɛw
column4: kɛse o: naaso obirɛmpɔn ne mee dze

column2: "Mbusu yaayaw bi wɔ hɔ a mehu no wɔ wi yi ase
column3: ɔno nye yi; ahonya a no wura kora do ma nankasa no mbusu:"

column2: "na eguadzi bɔn ma ahonya no sɛɛ; na sɛ ɔawo ɔba a
"Dɛ mbrɛ ofi ne na ne yamu bae no
column3: adagyaw ara so na ɔdze bɛsan akɔ dɛ mbrɛ ɔbae no
column4: na onnkenya ne berɛ mu hweeara

column2: "Na iyi so mbusu yaayaw a
column3: dɛ mbrɛ ɔnam bae no ara pɛr
column4: dɛmara so na ɔbɔkɔ: na mfaso bɛn na ɔyɛ ma no dɛ ɔberɛ ɔberɛhun?"

column2: "Na ne nda nyinara mu so odzidzi wɔ sum mu
column3: na no bo fuw dodow na onya yarba na yamugya."

column2: "Hwɛ
column3: dza mehu dɛ oye na ɔyɛ fɛw nye dɛ obi bedzidzi na ɔanom
column4: na oenya edziyie wɔ ne berɛ a ɔaberɛ wɔ wi yi ase nyinara mu
column5: no nkwa nda nyinara a Nyankopɔn dze ama no no: na iyi nye ne kyɛpɛn."

column2: "Nyimpa biara so a Nyankopɔn ama no ahonya na ahodze
column3: na ɔama no tum a ɔdze dzi bi
column5: na odzi ne berɛ mu ehurusi no; iyi nye Nyankopɔn akyɛdze."

column2: "Na ɔnnkɛkaa no nkwa nda pii; osiandɛ Nyankopɔn ama no enyigye dodow wɔ n'akoma mu."
